Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
Describes a specific God Card. Stores the name, title and description of its God and the set it belongs to. Contains a reference to the Controller associated with the Card and information about its modifiers if present.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean alwaysActiveModifier
    Set to true if the Card has an always active Modifier.
    private GodController controller
    The GodController associated with the Card.
    private java.lang.String description
    The Card's description.
    private java.lang.String god
    The God's name.
    private int set
    The Card's set (1 for basic Gods, 2 for advanced Gods).
    private java.lang.String title
    The God's title.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card​(java.lang.String god, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, int set, boolean alwaysActiveModifier, GodController controller)
      Card constructor. Sets the attributes of the Card to the values received as arguments.
      Parameters:
      god - the name of the God represented by the card
      title - the title of this Card
      description - the description of this Card
      set - the set this Card belongs to (1 or 2)
      alwaysActiveModifier - true if the Modifier associated with this Card is always active, false otherwise
      controller - the God Controller associated with the card
